$WmMPID_花嫁シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Oh, my word! What an absolute
scoundrel you are, Mister Breeze!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Oh, my...word?$k$pIs that what you said?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Are you kidding me? Look, we're
here to train! Do you want to get
married, or don't you?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Not...really...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Oh, look! Here comes a man with a
royal bearing! Put your heart into it!
Give it all you've got!$k$pDear me! Only the cruelest of fates
would force us to fight...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Dear...me.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_花嫁シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|You're so strong! No more, please,
milord! Have mercy!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|No more, please...$k$pNo, seriously. No more. Please.
I can't take this nonsense anymore!
Retreat!$k$Sbs150|
